verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
C
With our lips
Let us sing one confession
With our hearts
Hold to one truth alone

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
For He has erased
Our transgression
Claimed us and called us
His own His very own

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We're the people of God
Called by His name
Called from the dark
And delivered from shame
One holy race saints ev'ryone
Because of the blood
Of Christ Jesus the Son

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Hear us O spirits of darkness
So you will know
Where we stand
We are His servants

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Purchased with scars
Bought by the blood
Of the Lamb
The blood of the Lamb
